meaningMnemonic: You got your copy of "The <radical>Dry</radical> <radical>Knife</radical>." It's the newest <kanji>edition</kanji> of the magazine you love on keeping your knives dry.
readingMnemonic: In this <kanji>edition</kanji> of "The Dry Knife," there is a huge article written by Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん) on how he kept his knives dry while campaigning.
